scripts.deploy: node scripts/bump-version.js && git add package.json packages/*/package.json && git commit -m "$(node -e "process.stdout.write(require('./package.json').version)")" && yarn workspace @mono-labs/shared deploy && yarn workspace @mono-labs/project deploy && yarn workspace @mono-labs/expo deploy && yarn workspace @mono-labs/cli deploy && yarn workspace @mono-labs/dev deploy && yarn workspace @mono-labs/tracker deploy
